Title: Includes Denton Lake, Solomon Lake, and Westminster Lake as inland waterways for the purposes of waterfront revitalization
Summary: Relates to including Denton Lake, Solomon Lake, and Westminster Lake as inland waterways for the purposes of waterfront revitalization.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to including Denton Lake, Solomon Lake, and Westminster Lake in the town of Patterson as inland waterways for the purposes of waterfront revitalization
